title: Otoko no Ko Comic Anthology: Zettai Fukujuu-hen
original_name: オトコの娘コミックアンソロジー ～絶対服従編～
sinopse:
One-shots manga anthologies featuring traps. Each volume carries different theme.

Volume 8 theme: obedience

1. Chikage-chan Black - Episode 0
2. Boku wa Oneechan
3. Yowai Inu Hodoyoku Hoeru
4. Kaitou (Minaraichuu) Cat's Tail
5. Kanojo no Furi
6. Kimi Rashiku
7. Zettai Fukujuu!! Midzuki-kun
8. Kaori-san
9. Shikaeshi
